Professor,

l C

warnings.=
 When I run it,  I was informed by `input file gri30.inp not 
found in dire=
ctory'. Of course, I changed the system variables. Here 
I post the message=

look and see what the p=
roblem is?

By the way, once you said that you used MATLAB integrators rath=
er 
than CVODE to compare with DASAC. The results were in good agreement. 
=
What I am interesting is: Can cantera matlab version acts as an 
interprete=
r to form a couple of ODEFUN for matlab integrators such as 
the command [T=
,Y] =3D ODE15S(ODEFUN,TSPAN,Y0). If it can, how does it 
work? It will be e=
xcellent if you post the example using matlab 
integrators.

Or can specify=

such as "A+B+(M)=3DC=
+D+(M)" and to form reaction rate? 

Thanks a lots

Pingping
